Package maze.visualisation

Class TileRectangle

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.shape.Shape
javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
maze.visualisation.TileRectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class TileRectangle
extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
Container for the visualisation of a Tile in the routefinder maze
See Also:
Rectangle

    Methods inherited from interface javafx.css.Styleable

    getStyleableNode

  • Constructor Details

    • TileRectangle

      public TileRectangle​(double size, Tile inTile, boolean inRoute)
      Constructs a TileRectangle with the given size, tile and if it is in the route
      Parameters:
      size - : This is the size of the rectangle as double, passed to super as both width and height
      inTile - : The input tile, the color of the rectangle is determined by the tile type using findColor() method
      inRoute - : True if tile is part of the route, false otherwise. Used to help determine the rectangle color
      See Also:
      findColor(Tile, boolean)

  • Method Details

    • findColor

      public static javafx.scene.paint.Color findColor​(Tile inTile, boolean inRoute)
      Chooses the color for the rectangle Entrance: Blue Exit: Red Corridor: Green Wall: Black Route: Yellow
      Parameters:
      inTile - : The input tile in which its type will be used to determine color
      inRoute - : True if the tile is in the route, false otherwise. If true then color will yellow
      Returns:
      Returns the decided color of the rectangle

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile()
      Gets the tile attribute
      Returns:
      Returns the tile Tile attribute
